# init(configuration:)

**Initializer**

Creates a list content view with the specified content configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency convenience init(configuration: UIListContentConfiguration)
```

## Creating a list content view

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a list content view from data in an unarchiver.
